DOC.criteria: Under care physician least 2 month ( CKD ) Not active Vitamin D therapy least 4 week prior If female : Not childbearing potential , OR , Practicing birth control Not breastfeed If take phosphate binder , stable regimen least 4 week prior For entry Pretreatment Phase : iPTH least 120 pg/mL GFR 1560 mL/min dialysis expect least 6 month For entry Treatment Phase : Average 2 consecutive iPTH value least 150 pg/mL , take least 1 day apart ( value less 120 pg/mL_ 2 consecutive correct serum calcium level 8.010.0 mg/dL 2 consecutive serum phosphorus level 5.2 mg/mL History allergic reaction sensitivity similar drug Acute Renal Failure within 12 week study Chronic gastrointestinal disease Spot urine result demonstrate urinecalciumtourine creatinine ratio great 0,2 , history renal stone Taken aluminumcontaining phosphate binder within last 12 week , require medication 3 week study Current malignancy , clinically significant liver disease Active granulomatous disease ( TB , sarcoidosis , etc . ) History drug alcohol abuse within 6 month prior Evidence poor compliance diet medication Received investigational drug participate device trial within 30 day prior Taking maintenance calcitonin , bisphosphonates , drug may affect calcium bone metabolism ( female stable estrogen and/or progestin therapy ) On glucocorticoid period 14 day within last 6 month HIV positive
